description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Avatar Avenue is a simulation of a city street complete with randomly generated people, traffic and weather. Avatar Avenue's AI engine not only ensures that the Avatars have unique appearances but unique behaviors as well.Avatars will react to everything around them including each other in interesting ways.
